title: 怎么把一个权限组的圈地指令被取消，就是让整个权限组的人没有办法圈地
author: qwe1004645285

replies.author: 5igm
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: jin7568866
replies.txt_content:
在领地插件配置里找到
Groups:
    Default: #group name
       # Information about the Residence zone that the player can define.
       #Uncomment the lines below to mirror this config to other groups.
       #Mirror:
         #- 'group1'
         #- 'group2'
       Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true 将true改为false
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 3
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 2

replies.author: theoutking
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: qwe1004645285
replies.txt_content:
灬友情灬 发表于 2015-3-30 19:09
很简单
/mangdelp builder residence.create
假如我输入 mangdelp 112 residence .create，让提示The group doesn't hava direct access to that permission
